mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 2269) for an order placed by C & D Safety Co. for 300 window cards reading Danger Low Shoulder. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, payment method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
